QuestData.Title: A Splash of the Eternal
QuestData.Description:
I don't really know much about this place or its inhabitants, but what I do know is magic! I can sense ancient power from the waters near us.
Maybe that can help?
Let's check out that pond!
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Glimmercane extract water from the pool in the Untamed Verdure.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Place the Eternal Water in the inert automa.
QuestData.RewardText: <A small opening in the creature looks like the perfect size for a little pour of mystical water.>
